data.title: ROBERT MICHAEL WENZEL

data.text:
Robert Michael Wenzel, 34, husband of Kelly Elin Halverson Wenzel, died on Saturday, Dec. 21, 2019, at Prisma Health Richland Hospital in Columbia.

Born in Ridgewood, New Jersey, he was a son of Michael and Francine Robba Wenzel. Mr. Wenzel was a retired sergeant with the U.S. Army and served in Afghanistan and Kuwait. He was a Mason and member of the Knights of Columbus.

Surviving are his wife of Sumter; his parents of New Jersey; one son, Mason Ezekiel Wenzel; another son expected in early 2020; eight brothers; three sisters; his stepfather, Arthur "Mac" Dreher; numerous extended family members; his mother-in-law, Susan Halverson; and his father-in-law, Howard Hooper Halverson.

Funeral services will be held at 10 a.m. Saturday in the chapel of Elmore Hill McCreight Funeral Home with Pastor Donald C. Prosser officiating, followed by military honors.

The family will receive friends following the services in the chapel.

Online condolences may be sent to www.sumterfunerals.com.

Elmore Hill McCreight Funeral Home & Crematory, 221 Broad St., Sumter, is in charge of the arrangements, (803) 775-9386.
